courseName: Clinical Pharmacy via Study Centres - MSc
facultyName: Faculty of Health Sciences and Wellbeing
description: This course is taught at our quality-assured partners worldwide and will provide the additional postgraduate qualification you need to progress in your field. You will cover principles of clinical pharmacy and a range of therapeutic areas, including cardiovascular, respiratory, and palliative care.This course will challenge you, through an innovative and flexible teaching style, to be the best pharmacist for you and your patients. It provides you with an approach to practice, building on existing knowledge and experiences to extend your personal and professional development.
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
